title: Forever101
author: Forever101
content: As an investor who is eager to diversify his wealth to other areas what do you think about this, Building a hotel as means of investment or buying a bitcoins for a long term investment. If you are to choose among this options, which will you choose base on your personal view of things. Share your idea and Help someone to think right.

comments.author: Alone055
comments.body: Quote from: Forever101 on September 26, 2024, 07:17:17 PMAs an investor who is eager to diversify his wealth to other areas what do you think about this, Building a hotel as means of investment or buying a bitcoins for a long term investment. If you are to choose among this options, which will you choose base on your personal view of things. Share your idea and Help someone to think right. I'm not an investment expert, so my opinion wouldn't matter much. This is the reason why I avoid giving financial advice to anyone. However, I can throw my two cents about the matter and what I think of the two investments you have mentioned.First of all, the two things you have mentioned are different by nature. A hotel is a business that you start from scratch, its success will depend on how much you understand the niche and how you manage and maintain your business in the long run. The initial few years will be very crucial because that is the time when your business will either blossom or start dying off.Bitcoin and cryptocurrencies are investments that are completely different from business. You use your money to buy some Bitcoin, you hope that its price goes up so that you can sell what you have bought earlier and get some profit. You don't have to have an extremely large budget for this unlike starting a hotel business where you will need to buy or rent a place, pay for electricity, hire employees, etc.Finally, you need to keep in mind that it's easier and quicker to liquidate an investment but the same can't be the case with a business. If you buy 1 Bitcoin today, the price goes up $2,000 from where you bought it, you can sell your Bitcoin immediately and get the profit. You can't do that with a hotel, can you?These are just a few points. There are a lot of things one needs to consider before one concludes what one needs to do with their hard-earned money.

comments.author: franky1
comments.body: bitcoin or property..wellwhen you buy property like a hotel, usually its not just buy now sell later and profit.. when you buy property usually you then have to renovate it, do repairs. and ofcourse there is all the costs of the legal paperwork to transfer ownership, insurances, inspections, buying/updating liquor licences, etc, etcso buying a $2m hotel or $2m of bitcoin.. the hotel ends up costing you alot more then $2m in the first 6 monthshowever bitcoin does not have ongoing costswith a hotel, even during the renovation process you are not making money, instead you are paying out money, you even have to pay out town council/state property taxes even if its not making any incomethen you have to spend money recruiting staff training them and getting them ready to serve the first customer of the yearwhere as, with bitcoin if you buy on a dip where the price is near this 2nd half of years low, then the profitability of bitcoin can soon showmuch is the same with property like a hotel. if you buy it at a discount compared to valuation then profitability can show, should you want to flip the property over to a new owner. however most businesses dont sell property at value so good luck buying a cheap property on a dip.the only way to break even and profit from a hotel is if its location is in a tourist area that will get consistent occupancy and in a desired area you can charge a premium per room to cover all your ongoing costs, so good luck in your search.. or take the easier option which is bitcoin, which has less things to worry about on a long term bases

comments.body: Personally I don't like hotel business for various reasons. Both the hotel and Bitcoin is really good investment options, but I won't trade Bitcoin for hotel. I will rather invest in Bitcoin and maintain a low profile while my Bitcoin keeps appreciating year upon year. With hotel, you have to go through many paperworks and need a competent hand to manage it for you and you also have to worry about your competitors, so that you won't be outsmart out of the business. But in Bitcoin you will have rest of mind provided your investment is for the long term. You won't worry about competition as Bitcoin have no competition out there. Bitcoin is Bitcoin, as more people keeps adopting it and Bitcoin going mainstream, you stand a better chance of making huge profits. Every year more hotels are being built and the competition gets tougher, you won't be getting same number of customers as people will start shifting to the newly built hotels that keeps coming up. As time goes on your hotel will eventually become old fashion, but that can't happen with Bitcoin. That's why it best to invest in Bitcoin than hotel.
